channel.title: FCBot - A scriptable bot for the "Fuel Critical" game by JaGEx
channel.description:
Don't ask why I made this.
-Changes to the game that were necessary: --Overwrote the "getImage(URL)" method. --Gutted sound. (Wouldn't load fully otherwise)
Script methods overview: [code]void setFuel(int fuel) - Sets the current fuel of the ship to "fuel". void setLives(int lives) - Sets the current amount of lives to "lives". void setScore(int scor) - Sets the current score to "score". void setGameSpeed(int speed) - Sets the speed that the game scrolls to "speed". void setShipSpeed(int speed) - Sets the speed that the ship moves to "speed". void setDead(boolean dead) - Makes the player dead or not based on "dead".
int getFuel() - Returns the current amount of fuel. int getLives() - Returns the current amount of lives. int getScore() - Returns the current score. int getGameSpeed() - Returns the current scrolling speed. int getShipSpeed() - Returns the current ship speed. boolean getDead() - Returns true if dead.[/code]
Leat huh?
Dowload @: - [url=http://cheeseys.nationvoice.com/FCBot.rar]http://cheeseys.nationvoice.com/FCBot.rar[/url] - The attachment below.

item.title: FCBot - A scriptable bot for the "Fuel Critical" game by JaGEx
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

Don’t ask why I made this.

-Changes to the game that were necessary:
–Overwrote the “getImage(URL)” method.
–Gutted sound. (Wouldn’t load fully otherwise)

Script methods overview:

[code]void setFuel(int fuel) - Sets the current fuel of the ship to “fuel”.
void setLives(int lives) - Sets the current amount of lives to “lives”.
void setScore(int scor) - Sets the current score to “score”.
void setGameSpeed(int speed) - Sets the speed that the game scrolls to “speed”.
void setShipSpeed(int speed) - Sets the speed that the ship moves to “speed”.
void setDead(boolean dead) - Makes the player dead or not based on “dead”.

int getFuel() - Returns the current amount of fuel.
int getLives() - Returns the current amount of lives.
int getScore() - Returns the current score.
int getGameSpeed() - Returns the current scrolling speed.
int getShipSpeed() - Returns the current ship speed.
boolean getDead() - Returns true if dead.[/code]

Leat huh?

Dowload @:

  • http://cheeseys.nationvoice.com/FCBot.rar
  • The attachment below.

Read full topic
item.source: FCBot - A scriptable bot for the "Fuel Critical" game by JaGEx
